about_the_game:
Lustful Fingers

Experience the massage of your dreams.

Step into the role of a skilled masseur and welcome a variety of unique and beautiful female clients to your luxurious spa. Each client brings a different story, dialogue, and preferences. Can you relax their bodies while touching their souls?

In this journey:

  • Master advanced massage techniques: Muscle relaxation, joint manipulation, hot stone therapies, and even romantic moments in the jacuzzi. Decide which areas to focus on and how to treat them.

  • Build deeper connections: Develop bonds with your clients, uncover their stories, and take your relationships to more intimate levels. But remember, every client is different, and finding the right rhythm is key.

  • Immerse yourself in realistic massage mechanics: Receive real-time feedback as you hone your techniques. Your every move affects your clients' responses and satisfaction.

  • Enjoy a blend of luxury and eroticism: Indulge in a warm, inviting spa atmosphere with soft lighting, creating a mix of relaxation and allure.

Your relationships are in your hands:

  • Some clients may be eager to move things forward quickly, while others will test your patience and skills. Your choices will shape their interest in you.

Explore your own spa world and embark on an unforgettable journey.

Designed exclusively for adult players, Lustful Fingers offers a unique blend of simulation and adult content.

content_descriptors.notes:
- Nudity
- Dirty language
- Strong sexual content

name: Lustful Fingers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5 6400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

Each client brings a different story, dialogue, and preferences. Can you relax their bodies while touching their souls?
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
